name: ONOS
description: Onos is a safety & sustainability platform that helps companies reduce risk, enhance compliance, and lower their carbon footprint by automating and streamlining data collection, management, and reporting tools, eliminating busy work, and centralising key processes.
one_liner: Onos is a safety & sustainability platform that helps companies reduce risk, enhance compliance, and lower their carbon footprint by automating and streamlining data collection, management, and reporting tools, eliminating busy work, and centralising key processes.
